name: Captured Nightmare
description:
Capture Nightmare is a HARD game where you can embark on a fascinating story of a naive young man, this adventure game has a dark story which leaves more questions in each level; latent questions, the objective is to reveal a dark and murky family history.

In the game you can find:

- Challenges like old games
- You will dedicate yourself to a mission.
- Prepare to face difficult and almost endless enemies.
- Traps everywhere and endless falls.
- You only have one life, if you lose, you start from zero.
- Warning: not even in dead the enemies will stop

The challenge is your life one by one, try to survive by winning and advancing. It's your life and perseverance is what keeps us moving forward. Complete it or rage quick it trying

Resistance, perseverance, frustration, fun, challenges and self-control, you will find in this game. Because it is prone to awakening explosive emotions and being tenacious in wanting to complete it. Just breathe and accept this challenge that will make you know your limit in your emotions. There are just 10 levels to complete each one different than the last one but same tematic all in there will try to kill you. I hope your muscle memory is ready because you will need it

Like life itself, only one chance to live or die. By only having one life, one existence, we can discover the truth, only one opportunity to live, advance and find the answers to the unknowns that we stumbled upon along the way.

Do you accept this challenge?
